The Kashiwa o-tachi has a thin yamagane tsuba.  That's the only published one I can think of that doesn't have a nerikawa tsuba.

Jim
  Just a couple koshirae that go with blades. One is certainly a thick
  kawa-tsuba, and the other is difficult to determine, but it is thin.

  G
